item.title: 中国愿继续加强与白俄罗斯的合作 - 官方媒体
item.description:
China is willing to continue strengthening its strategic cooperation with Belarus, President Xi Jinping was cited as saying after meeting with Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko on Monday.翻译:习近平主席周一在会见白俄罗斯总统卢卡申科后表示，中方愿继续加强同白俄罗斯的战略合作。

Xi also said China is willing to enhance coordination and cooperation with Belarus in multilateral mechanisms such as the United Nations and the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation, the official news agency Xinhua said.翻译:据官方通讯社新华社报道，习近平还表示，中国愿同白俄罗斯加强在联合国、上海合作组织等多边机制中的协调与合作。

Xi told Lukashenko that both countries should improve cross-border transport facilitation and promote economic and trade ties as well as people-to-people exchanges, according to Xinhua.翻译:据新华社报道，习近平对卢卡申科表示，两国要改善跨境交通便利化，促进经贸关系和人文交流。

The Chinese leader also said Beijing and the Eastern European country should implement projects such as the China-Belarus industrial park and promote industrial cooperation.翻译:中国领导人还表示，北京和东欧国家应实施中白工业园等项目，促进产业合作。

Reporting by Ella Cao and Liz Lee; Editing by Kim Coghill and Jamie Freed翻译:Ella Cao 和 Liz Lee 报道；金·科吉尔和杰米·弗里德编辑

item.title: 亚洲股市涨跌互现，金价突破 2,100 美元历史新高
item.description:
Summary:
  • Asian stock markets :
  • Nikkei slips as yen rises, S&P 500 futures -0.1%
  • Bonds run into profit-taking, gold tops $2,100
  • Wagers on U.S. rate cuts to be tested by payrolls
  • Shipping attacked in Red Sea, oil still struggling
翻译:概括：
  • 亚洲股市：
  • 日经指数因日元升值而下滑，标准普尔 500 指数期货 -0.1%
  • 债券遭遇获利了结，金价突破2100美元
  • 美国降息赌注将受到非农就业数据的检验
  • 红海航运遇袭，石油仍在苦苦挣扎

Asian shares turned mixed on Monday while gold spiked to all-time peaks above $2,100 at the start of a busy week for economic data that will test market wagers for early and aggressive rate cuts from major central banks next year.翻译:周一，亚洲股市涨跌互现，黄金价格飙升至 2,100 美元以上的历史新高，因为经济数据将在繁忙的一周开始，这将考验市场对明年主要央行提前大幅降息的押注。

In particular, the U.S. November payrolls report on Friday needs to be solid enough to support the economic soft-landing scenario, but not so strong as to threaten the chance of easing. Median forecasts are for payrolls to rise 180,000, keeping unemployment steady at 3.9%.翻译:特别是，周五美国 11 月非农就业报告需要足够强劲以支持经济软着陆情景，但又不能强到威胁宽松的可能性。预计就业人数中位数将增加 18 万人，失业率稳定在 3.9%。翻译:预计就业人数中位数将增加 18 万人，失业率稳定在 3.9%。

Many analysts suspect risks are to the upside, with Goldman Sachs tipping 238,000 including a chunk of workers returning from strikes, and a jobless rate of 3.8%.翻译:许多分析师怀疑存在上行风险，高盛 (Goldman Sachs) 预计将有 238,000 人失业，其中包括大量罢工后返回的工人，失业率为 3.8%。

There was also still a risk the Israel-Hamas war could widen into a broader conflict with three commercial vessels coming under attack in the southern Red Sea.翻译:以色列与哈马斯的战争仍有可能扩大为更广泛的冲突，三艘商船在红海南部遭到袭击。

MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan (.MIAPJ0000PUS) was up 0.3%, led by gains in South Korea and Australia. Japan's Nikkei (.N225) dipped 0.6% as the yen extended recent gains.翻译:MSCI 日本以外亚太地区最广泛股票指数(.MIAPJ0000PUS)上涨 0.3%，其中韩国和澳大利亚股市上涨。由于日元延续近期涨势，日本日经指数(.N225)下跌 0.6%。

Chinese blue chips (.CSI300) eased 0.5%, while the country's central bank set another firm fix for the yuan.翻译:中国蓝筹股（.CSI300）下跌0.5%，而中国央行再次确定人民币汇率。

Trade figures for China are due later in the week with the recent trend being softening exports to the U.S., overshadowing gains in Asia.翻译:中国的贸易数据将于本周晚些时候公布，近期的趋势是对美国的出口疲软，掩盖了亚洲的增长。

EUROSTOXX 50 futures and FTSE futures were little changed. S&P 500 futures dipped 0.2%, after finishing at a 20-month high on Friday, while Nasdaq futures lost 0.3%. The S&P 500 is up 19% for the year so far and just 4% away from its all-time peak.翻译:EUROSTOXX 50 期货和 FTSE 期货变化不大。标准普尔 500 指数期货周五收于 20 个月高点后下跌 0.2%，纳斯达克指数期货下跌 0.3%。迄今为止，标准普尔 500 指数今年以来已上涨 19%，距离历史最高点仅 4%。

The latest surge was stoked by wagers the next move by the Federal Reserve will be to cut rates, with Fed Chair Jerome Powell on Friday declining the opportunity to push back hard against aggressive market pricing.翻译:最近一次的飙升是由于押注美联储的下一步行动将是降息，美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔周五拒绝了对激进的市场定价进行强力反击的机会。

Futures now imply a 60% chance the Fed will ease as soon as March, up from 21% a week ago, and are pricing in around 135 basis points (bps) of cuts for all of 2024.翻译:目前，期货意味着美联储最早在 3 月份实施宽松政策的可能性为 60%，高于一周前的 21%，并预计 2024 年全年将降息约 135 个基点 (bps)。

The turnaround in Treasuries has been nothing short of astonishing as two-year yields fell 41 bps in just a week, the best performance since the mini-crisis in U.S. banks back in March.翻译:美国国债的好转令人震惊，两年期国债收益率在短短一周内下跌了 41 个基点，这是自 3 月份美国银行业发生小危机以来的最佳表现。

So it was no surprise that some profit-taking emerged on Monday and nudged yields on 10-year notes up to 4.25%, but still well short of the October top of 5.02%.

BULLISH FOR EM

"Our baseline scenario is for a soft landing for the U.S. economy, with positive but below-potential sequential growth for the next six quarters," said BofA global economist Claudio Irigoyen.翻译:美国银行全球经济学家克劳迪奥·伊里戈延 (Claudio Irigoyen) 表示：“我们的基准情景是美国经济软着陆，未来六个季度将出现积极但低于潜力的环比增长。”

"Starting in June we expect the Fed to start cutting rates by 25bp per quarter until reaching a terminal rate of 3% in 2026," he added. "Our year-end 2024 U.S. rate forecasts for two- year and 10-year Treasuries are 4.00% and 4.25%, bringing an end to the yield curve inversion."翻译:他补充道：“从 6 月开始，我们预计美联储将开始每季度降息 25 个基点，直到 2026 年最终利率达到 3%。” “我们对2024年年底美国两年期和10年期国债利率的预测分别为4.00%和4.25%，结束了收益率曲线倒挂。”

Such an outlook should also be positive for emerging markets, with BofA noting returns in the 12 months after the last Fed hike tend to be highly positive with EM equities averaging around 10% and total EM bond returns even higher.翻译:这样的前景对新兴市场来说也应该是积极的，美国银行指出，美联储上次加息后 12 个月的回报往往非常乐观，新兴市场股票平均回报率约为 10%，新兴市场债券总回报率甚至更高。

Central bank meetings in Canada and Australia this week are both expected to see rates there unchanged.翻译:预计本周在加拿大和澳大利亚举行的央行会议都将维持利率不变。

The tumble in Treasury yields in turn pulled the rug out from under the dollar, particularly on the yen where it slid 1.8% last week and was last down at 146.71 .翻译:美国国债收益率的暴跌反过来又使美元不再受压，尤其是日元，上周日元下跌1.8%，最新跌至146.71美元。

Speculation about an eventual unwinding of the Bank of Japan's super-easy policies has added to the pressure on yen carry trades and could carry the Japanese currency back to its July highs around 138.00.翻译:有关日本央行最终退出超级宽松政策的猜测加大了日元套利交易的压力，并可能将日元带回 7 月高点 138.00 左右。

The euro was flat at $1.0874. It had also been climbing recently but suffered a reversal last week when surprisingly soft inflation data led markets to price in a March rate cut from the European Central Bank.翻译:欧元兑美元持平于 1.0874 美元。最近也一直在攀升，但上周出现逆转，令人惊讶的疲软通胀数据导致市场消化了欧洲央行三月份的降息。

The ever-hawkish Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel pushed back against the doves in an interview over the weekend, but with inflation subsiding so fast markets figure the ECB will have to ease just to stop real rates from rising.翻译:一向鹰派的德国央行行长约阿希姆·内格尔在周末接受采访时反驳了鸽派观点，但随着通胀消退得如此之快，市场认为欧洲央行将不得不放松货币政策，以阻止实际利率上升。

ECB President Christine Lagarde will have her own chance to comment in a speech and Q&A later on Monday.翻译:欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德将有机会在周一晚些时候的演讲和问答中发表评论。

The dive in yields and the dollar has been a boon for non-yielding gold, which added 0.9% to $2,088 an ounce, after hitting a record of $2,111.39 an ounce .翻译:收益率和美元的跳水对无收益的黄金来说是一个福音，在触及每盎司 2,111.39 美元的纪录后，黄金上涨 0.9% 至每盎司 2,088 美元。

Oil prices have not been so fortunate, amid doubts OPEC+ will be able to maintain planned output cuts. At the same time, U.S. oil production is at record levels above 13 million barrels a day and rig counts are still rising.翻译:由于人们怀疑 OPEC+ 是否能够维持计划的减产，油价就没那么幸运了。与此同时，美国石油产量达到创纪录水平，超过每天 1300 万桶，钻井数量仍在增加。

The attacks on shipping in the Red Sea offered only fleeting support and Brent eased 51 cents to $78.37 a barrel, while U.S. crude fell 44 cents to $73.63.翻译:红海航运遭受的袭击仅提供了短暂的支撑，布伦特原油价格下跌 51 美分，至每桶 78.37 美元，而美国原油价格下跌 44 美分，至每桶 73.63 美元。

Reporting by Wayne Cole; Editing by Sam Holmes and Kim Coghill翻译:韦恩·科尔报道；山姆·霍姆斯和金·科吉尔编辑

item.title: 麦当劳加大对中国的押注，与西方公司降低风险的趋势背道而驰
item.description:
The decision by McDonald's (MCD.N) to take greater control of its China business and expand aggressively in the face of a consumer slowdown and geopolitical tensions seems risky - but the potential pay-off is great, analysts say.翻译:分析师表示，面对消费放缓和地缘政治紧张局势，麦当劳(MCD.N)决定加强对中国业务的控制并积极扩张，这似乎有风险，但潜在的回报是巨大的。

Last month, the U.S.-based burger maker cut a deal to repurchase the 28% stake in its China business Carlyle Group took in 2017, giving it a 48% share in $6 billion worth of operations that include Hong Kong and Macau.翻译:上个月，这家总部位于美国的汉堡制造商达成协议，回购凯雷集团 2017 年持有的中国业务 28% 的股份，使其在包括香港和澳门在内的价值 60 亿美元的业务中拥有 48% 的股份。

The move contrasts sharply with the prevailing trend of multinational corporations reeling back investments in China or even exiting altogether because of geopolitical and economic challenges.翻译:此举与跨国公司因地缘政治和经济挑战而减少在华投资甚至完全退出的普遍趋势形成鲜明对比。

One advantage for McDonald’s: its majority partner in the China business, CITIC, provides top-level political cover, said Jason Yu, greater China managing director of market research firm Kantar Worldpanel.翻译:市场研究公司凯度消费者指数(Kantar Worldpanel)大中华区总经理贾森·于(Jason Yu)表示，麦当劳的优势之一是：其在中国业务的主要合作伙伴中信集团提供了高层政治掩护。

"Having a very powerful Chinese state-owned conglomerate as a partner means they are not going to be at the forefront of the geopolitical situation; that is quite important," Yu said.翻译:“拥有一家非常强大的中国国有企业集团作为合作伙伴意味着他们不会处于地缘政治局势的最前沿；这一点非常重要，”于说。

McDonald's China, Carlyle Group and CITIC declined to comment.翻译:麦当劳中国、凯雷集团和中信集团均拒绝置评。

Other consumer-facing U.S. firms, including Starbucks (SBUX.O), Apple (AAPL.O), Coach owner Tapestry (TPR.N) and sportswear giant Nike (NKE.N), have remained similarly dedicated to the China market.翻译:其他面向消费者的美国公司，包括星巴克(SBUX.O) 、苹果(AAPL.O) 、Coach 所有者 Tapestry (TPR.N)和运动服装巨头耐克(NKE.N) ，也同样致力于中国市场。

Starbucks and Nike, which face increased competition from lower-priced domestic competitors, show the need to stay agile in order to protect and grow market share, analysts say.翻译:分析师表示，星巴克和耐克面临来自国内低价竞争对手的日益激烈的竞争，这表明需要保持敏捷性，以保护和扩大市场份额。

The coffee giant is sticking with expansion plans and launched a smaller cup size; Nike, by contrast, has offered localised, higher-end sneakers such as its "Year of the Rabbit" Dunk Lows.翻译:这家咖啡巨头坚持扩张计划，并推出了更小的杯子尺寸；相比之下，耐克则提供本地化的高端运动鞋，例如“兔年”Dunk Lows。

McDonald’s has used funds from the Carlyle investment to double its restaurant count since 2017 to 5,500, and the country has become its second-largest market. The business aims to have more than 10,000 stores in China by 2028.翻译:自 2017 年以来，麦当劳利用凯雷投资的资金将其餐厅数量增加了一倍，达到 5,500 家，中国已成为其第二大市场。该公司的目标是到2028年在中国拥有超过10,000家门店。

Competitors of McDonald's are also expanding their reach in China.翻译:麦当劳的竞争对手也在扩大其在中国的影响力。

Yum China, which operates KFC and Pizza Hut, among other brands, already has more than 14,000 stores across the country. Among domestic players, chicken burger specialist Wallace said in 2021 that it had reached 20,000 stores, and newer entrant Tastien, which specialises in "Chinese-style" burgers, has more than 3,500 stores.翻译:百胜中国旗下经营肯德基和必胜客等品牌，已在全国拥有超过14,000家门店。在国内企业中，鸡肉汉堡专营商华莱士表示，2021年其门店数量已达到2万家，而新进入者专注于“中式”汉堡的Tastien则拥有超过3500家门店。

To be sure, if relations between China and the West worsen, any optimism could evaporate, said Greg Halter, Director of Research at investment advisory firm Carnegie Investment Counsel.翻译:投资咨询公司卡内基投资顾问公司(Carnegie Investment Counsel)研究总监格雷格·哈尔特(Greg Halter)表示，可以肯定的是，如果中国与西方之间的关系恶化，任何乐观情绪都可能消失。

"If tensions deteriorate, we may see not only McDonald's, but other companies divest their Chinese operations, similar to what has occurred in Russia over the past two years," Halter said.翻译:哈尔特表示：“如果紧张局势恶化，我们可能不仅会看到麦当劳，还会看到其他公司剥离其在中国的业务，类似于过去两年俄罗斯发生的情况。”

Further digitalisation and localisation are needed, Yu said, with localisation key to winning over taste buds in China's $140.2 billion limited-service restaurant sector.翻译:Yu 表示，需要进一步的数字化和本地化，而本地化是赢得中国价值 1,402 亿美元的有限服务餐饮业味蕾的关键。

Although the McDonald's China menu would be familiar to U.S. consumers, there are nods to local tastes, including taro pie, rather than apple.翻译:尽管麦当劳中国的菜单对美国消费者来说很熟悉，但还是迎合了当地的口味，包括芋头派，而不是苹果派。

According to Euromonitor, the market value of limited-service restaurants in China is on track to grow about 4% annually on average through 2025. Of the limited-service burger-focussed restaurants in the country, McDonald's dominates with a 70% share of the market.翻译:根据 Euromonitor 的数据，到 2025 年，中国有限服务餐厅的市场价值有望平均每年增长 4% 左右。在中国以汉堡为主的有限服务餐厅中，麦当劳占据主导地位，占据 70% 的份额。市场。

China's slowing economic growth and lacklustre consumer spending this year have already hurt the bottom lines of global businesses exposed to its consumer market, but McDonald's is well-placed to outperform, said Ben Cavender, the Shanghai-based managing director and head of strategy at China Market Research Group.翻译:麦当劳中国区董事总经理兼战略主管本·卡文德 (Ben Cavender) 表示，今年中国经济增长放缓和消费者支出低迷，已经损害了与其消费市场相关的全球企业的利润，但麦当劳完全有能力跑赢大市。市场研究小组。

He said value-driven middle class consumers and lower commercial rents countrywide should be a boon to such businesses.翻译:他表示，价值驱动的中产阶级消费者和全国范围内较低的商业租金应该对此类企业有利。

"If ever there was a time to double down on China, this is it," he said.翻译:“如果有一个时机对中国加倍下注，那就是现在了，”他说。

Reporting by Casey Hall in Shanghai and Kane Wu in Hong Kong; additional reporting from Deborah Sophia in Bengaluru. Editing by Gerry Doyle翻译:上海Casey Hall和香港Kane Wu的报道；来自班加罗尔黛博拉·索菲亚的补充报道。格里·多伊尔编辑

item.title: 早间买盘：由于石油未能点火，黄金上涨
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole翻译:韦恩·科尔 (Wayne Cole) 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望

Asian stocks have made a hesitant start to the week, while gold hit a new peak and Treasuries ran into profit-taking on their recent stellar gains. Oil failed to sustain an early rally that followed news of attacks on commercial shipping in the Red Sea.翻译:亚洲股市本周开局犹豫不决，而黄金价格创下新高，美国国债因近期的强劲上涨而遭遇获利了结。在红海商业航运遭到袭击的消息传出后，油价未能维持早盘上涨。

Three vessels came under attack in international waters on Sunday, while Yemen's Houthi group claimed drone and missile attacks on two Israeli vessels in the area.翻译:周日，三艘船只在国际水域遭到袭击，也门胡塞武装声称该地区的两艘以色列船只遭到无人机和导弹袭击。

The threat to such a major global shipping route could add to inflationary pressure, although the impact seemed limited so far. Notably, oil prices lost early gains and Brent eased around 57 cents to $78.31 a barrel amid doubts that OPEC+ would be able to maintain planned output cuts, particularly by some African countries.翻译:对如此重要的全球航线的威胁可能会增加通胀压力，尽管到目前为止影响似乎有限。值得注意的是，由于人们怀疑 OPEC+ 能否维持减产计划，特别是一些非洲国家的减产计划，油价回吐早盘涨幅，布伦特原油价格下跌约 57 美分至每桶 78.31 美元。

At the same time, U.S. oil output is at record levels above 13 million barrels a day and rig counts are still rising. That means the U.S. is producing more oil than Saudi Arabia right now.翻译:与此同时，美国石油产量达到创纪录水平，超过每天 1300 万桶，钻井数量仍在增加。这意味着美国目前的石油产量超过了沙特阿拉伯。

A commodity faring better is gold, which surged suddenly this morning to top $2,111 an ounce for the first time before paring the gains to $2,086.翻译:表现较好的大宗商品是黄金，今天早上黄金首次飙升至每盎司 2,111 美元上方，随后又回落至每盎司 2,086 美元。

There was no obvious catalyst for the move, leaving dealers suspecting the hidden hand of trend-following CTAs and algo funds following the break of a triple-top around $2,107.翻译:这一走势没有明显的催化剂，让交易商怀疑在突破 2,107 美元附近的三重顶后，趋势跟踪型 CTA 和算法基金背后隐藏着什么力量。

Central banks have also been gold bugs, buying a net 800 metric tons in the year to September in a record for that period. Bulls are now touting chart targets at $2,240 and $2,400.翻译:各国央行也一直热衷于黄金，截至 9 月份的一年内净购买了800 吨黄金，创下同期历史纪录。多头目前将图表目标定为 2,240 美元和 2,400 美元。

Market pricing for early and aggressive rate cuts is clearly a positive for non-yielding gold, with Fed fund futures currently implying a 59% chance of a U.S. cut as early as March. A week ago that probability was around 20%.翻译:市场对早期大幅降息的定价显然对无收益黄金有利，目前联邦基金期货暗示美国最早在 3 月份降息的可能性为 59%。一周前，这种可能性约为 20%。

There are also 125 basis points (bps) of easing implied for all of 2024, up from 80 bps a couple of weeks ago.翻译:2024 年全年还将实施 125 个基点的宽松政策，高于几周前的 80 个基点。

In addition, markets are pricing in an 80% chance of the ECB easing in March, although the hawkish head of Bundesbank pushed back against such prospects in an interview over the weekend.翻译:此外，市场预计欧洲央行 3 月份实施宽松政策的可能性为 80%，尽管这位鹰派德国央行行长在周末接受采访时反驳了这种前景。

ECB President Christine Lagarde will have her chance to comment in a speech and Q&A later on Monday.翻译:欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德将有机会在周一晚些时候的演讲和问答中发表评论。

Such extreme pricing leaves the market vulnerable to pullbacks, and both Fed funds and Treasuries ran into selling on Monday. Yields on U.S. two-year notes rose almost 4 bps, but that follows a drop of 40 bps last week.翻译:这种极端的定价使市场容易出现回调，联邦基金和国债周一都遭遇抛售。美国两年期国债收益率上涨近 4 个基点，但上周下跌 40 个基点。

German two-year bunds also look susceptible to some profit-taking after yields dived 41 bps last week.翻译:德国两年期国债收益率上周下跌 41 个基点后，看起来也容易受到一些获利了结的影响。

Bonds really need U.S. November payrolls on Friday to be solid enough to support the soft-landing scenario, but not so strong as to threaten the chance of easing.翻译:债券确实需要周五美国 11 月非农就业数据足够强劲以支持软着陆情景，但又不能强到威胁宽松的机会。

Median forecasts are for payrolls to rise 180,000, keeping unemployment steady at 3.9%.翻译:预计就业人数中位数将增加 18 万人，失业率稳定在 3.9%。

Many analysts suspect risks are to the upside, with Goldman Sachs tipping 238,000, including a chunk of workers returning from strikes, and a jobless rate of 3.8%.翻译:许多分析师怀疑存在上行风险，高盛 (Goldman Sachs) 预测失业人数为 238,000 人，其中包括大批工人从罢工中返回，失业率为 3.8%。

Key developments that could influence markets on Monday:翻译:可能影响周一市场的主要事态发展：

- Speech and Q&A by ECB President Christine Lagarde翻译:- 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德的讲话和问答

- Riksbank First Deputy Governor Anna Breman speaks, Riksbank publishes minutes from policy meeting翻译:- 瑞典央行第一副行长安娜·布雷曼发表讲话，瑞典央行发布政策会议纪要

- German trade data for Oct, Euro Zone sentiment index for Dec. Data on U.S. durable goods and auto sales翻译:- 德国10月贸易数据、欧元区12月情绪指数、美国耐用品和汽车销售数据

item.title: 中国恒大清算听证会意外延期至一月
item.description:
China Evergrande Group (3333.HK) on Monday said it has been granted an adjournment of a court hearing into a liquidation petition to Jan. 29, giving the embattled property developer time to finalise a revamped debt restructuring proposal.翻译:中国恒大集团（3333.HK）周一表示，已获准将清算申请的法庭听证会推迟至1月29日，这让这家陷入困境的房地产开发商有时间敲定修改后的债务重组方案。

The decision came as the world's most indebted developer with more than $300 billion in liabilities sought adjournment unexpectedly unopposed by the petitioner's lawyer.翻译:这一决定是在全球债务最重的开发商（负债超过 3000 亿美元）寻求延期审理之际做出的，出人意料的是，申请人的律师并未反对。

On Oct. 29, at the previous adjournment, Hong Kong High Court Justice Linda Chan said Monday's hearing would be the last before a decision was made whether to liquidate Evergrande in the absence of a "concrete" restructuring plan.翻译:10月29日，香港高等法院法官陈嘉欣在上一次休庭中表示，周一的听证会将是在没有“具体”重组计划的情况下决定是否清算恒大之前的最后一次听证会。

After Monday's adjournment, Evergrande stock reversed losses from earlier in the day to jump more than 13%.翻译:周一休会后，恒大股价扭转当天早些时候的跌幅，涨幅超过 13%。

Evergrande defaulted on offshore debt in late 2021, becoming the poster child of a debt crisis that has engulfed China's property sector. Last week it scrambled to revise its restructuring plan to avoid liquidation, Reuters has reported.翻译:恒大集团于2021年底出现境外债务违约，成为席卷中国房地产行业的债务危机的典型代表。据路透社报道，上周该公司匆忙修改重组计划以避免清算。

Evergrande "somewhat surprisingly has obtained some further time to rethink its plans," said partner Neil McDonald of Kirkland & Ellis, a legal adviser to a key group of offshore creditors opposed to the revised terms. However, the firm is likely to be wound up at the next hearing if it does not come up with a plan accepted by all classes of creditors, he said.

SURPRISE

Hong Kong-based investment firm Top Shine filed the petition in June 2022 saying Evergrande had not honoured an agreement to repurchase shares it bought in Evergrande unit Fangchebao.翻译:总部位于香港的投资公司Top Shine于2022年6月提交请愿书，称恒大没有履行回购恒大子公司房车宝股份的协议。

The petitioner surprised the court on Monday when its lawyer started proceedings saying he was "instructed not to present any argument in opposition to" adjournment.翻译:周一，请愿人的律师在启动诉讼程序时表示，请愿人“被指示不要提出任何反对休庭的论据”，这令法庭感到惊讶。

Justice Chan ordered the petitioner inform other creditors a week ahead of the next hearing should it decide to withdraw the petition, so the other creditors can fill in if they wish.翻译:陈法官命令，如果请愿人决定撤回请愿书，请在下次听证会前一周通知其他债权人，以便其他债权人可以根据需要填写。

"We'll see what happens with the company before the 29th but if nothing changes, then yes," said Kirkland's McDonald when asked by reporters whether the creditors Kirkland represents will file to liquidate Evergrande if the petitioner withdraws.翻译:当被记者问及如果申请人退出，柯克兰代表的债权人是否会申请清算恒大时，柯克兰的麦克唐纳表示：“我们将在29号之前看看该公司会发生什么，但如果没有任何变化，那么是的。”

Evergrande's lawyer told the court the developer expects to "refine" its restructuring proposal in the next five weeks.翻译:恒大的律师告诉法庭，开发商预计将在未来五周内“完善”其重组方案。

Justice Chan said Evergrande must hold direct discussion with "relevant authorities" on the new terms, and that the plan needs support from all classes of creditors by the next hearing.翻译:陈法官表示，恒大必须就新条款与“有关当局”进行直接讨论，并且该计划需要在下次听证会之前得到各级债权人的支持。

Evergrande had failed to get the 75% approval required from so-called Class C creditors for original terms proposed in March, sources previously told Reuters.翻译:消息人士此前告诉路透社，恒大未能获得所谓 C 级债权人 3 月份提出的原始条款所需的 75% 批准。

Managing Director Bert Grisel of investment bank Moelis & Co - advising the same group of creditors - said the group "firmly" rejects the revised plan in its current form because it would be worse than what they would be entitled to in a liquidation.翻译:为同一组债权人提供咨询服务的投资银行 Moelis & Co 的董事总经理 Bert Grisel 表示，该集团“坚决”拒绝目前形式的修订计划，因为这将比他们在清算中有权获得的更糟糕。

"Liquidation does little good to creditors, but it is extremely difficult to get a debt repayment plan that satisfies everyone - that is why we have a deadlock with Evergrande here," said credit analyst Ting Meng at ANZ Bank China.

UNFINISHED HOMES

Liquidation of Evergrande, which listed $240 billion in assets as at June-end, would increase pressure on the already reeling property sector, which accounts for a quarter of the world's second-largest economy.翻译:截至6月底，恒大集团的资产已达2400亿美元，其清算将给本已摇摇欲坠的房地产行业带来更大压力，该行业占全球第二大经济体的四分之一。

Its debt woes have been a major concern for global investors at a time when the economy has struggled for a strong post-pandemic recovery, with property sales slowing and hundreds of thousands of homes left unfinished.翻译:在经济难以在疫情后强劲复苏、房地产销售放缓、数十万套房屋未完工之际，其债务困境一直是全球投资者的主要担忧。

Authorities have announced a string of measures to revive the sector, destabilised in the last few years by the debt woes Evergrande and other giants such as Country Garden (2007.HK).翻译:当局宣布了一系列措施来振兴该行业，该行业在过去几年因恒大集团和碧桂园（2007.HK）等其他巨头的债务危机而不稳定。

Evergrande has been working on a debt revamp plan for almost two years. Its original plan was thrown off course in late September when it said its billionaire founder Hui Ka Yan was under investigation for suspected criminal activity.翻译:恒大近两年来一直致力于债务重组计划。 9月下旬，该公司称其亿万富翁创始人许家印因涉嫌犯罪活动而接受调查，原定计划被打乱。

At the time, the developer also said it failed to win regulatory approval to issue new U.S. dollar bonds - a crucial part of the restructuring plan - as its flagship onshore unit was also under investigation.翻译:当时，该开发商还表示，发行新的美元债券未能获得监管部门的批准——这是重组计划的关键部分——因为其旗舰在岸子公司也正在接受调查。

Reporting by Clare Jim and Xie Yu in Hong Kong; Writing by Sumeet Chatterjee; Editing by Kim Coghill and Christopher Cushing翻译:Clare Jim 和 Xie Yu 在香港的报道；苏米特·查特吉 (Sumeet Chatterjee) 撰写；金·科吉尔和克里斯托弗·库欣编辑

item.title: 韩国将就尿素出口延误问题与中国磋商
item.description:
South Korea on Monday said it will consult China to prevent disruption to urea supplies after Korean companies reported the fertiliser and emissions reducing chemical was taking longer to pass through Chinese customs on its way to the peninsula.翻译:韩国周一表示，将与中国磋商，以防止尿素供应中断，此前韩国公司报告称，化肥和减排化学品在运往半岛的过程中通过中国海关的时间较长。

The reports follow calls from China's nitrogen fertiliser association last month to prioritise supplies for domestic use after prices hit a two-year high. They also come after Indian industry figures in September flagged delays at Chinese ports.翻译:在此报告发布之前，中国氮肥协会上个月在价格触及两年高点后呼吁优先供应国内使用。此前，印度行业数据显示中国港口出现延误。

The issue has raised concern about a repeat of a supply crunch in 2021 when China's government effectively halted exports of urea - a type of nitrogen used as fertiliser in agriculture as well as to curb diesel and industrial emissions.翻译:这一问题引发了人们对 2021 年供应紧缩重演的担忧，当时中国政府实际上停止了尿素的出口。尿素是一种用作农业肥料以及抑制柴油和工业排放的氮。

South Korea imports over 90% of its urea supply from China.翻译:韩国90%以上的尿素供应来自中国。

"We have confirmed customs delays, and there was no political background but economic factors, mainly due to tight urea supplies within China," Ministry of Trade, Industry and Energy spokesperson Choi Nam-ho told a briefing on Monday.翻译:产业通商资源部发言人崔南浩周一在新闻发布会上表示：“我们已经确认海关延误，这不是政治背景，而是经济因素，主要是由于中国国内尿素供应紧张。”

In a statement late on Sunday, the ministry said it had supplies sufficient for three months, with imports also coming from Vietnam and Japan.翻译:该部在周日晚间的一份声明中表示，其供应量足以维持三个月，其中还从越南和日本进口。

It also said it was working to prevent shortages by boosting reserves for vehicle use and supporting the industry to diversify import channels.翻译:它还表示，正在通过增加汽车使用储备和支持该行业实现进口渠道多元化来努力防止短缺。

South Korean trade minister Ahn Duk-geun also met with his counterpart in Beijing on Monday and called on China to immediately resolve the customs clearance issue, the ministry said in a separate statement on Monday.翻译:韩国贸易部长安德根周一也在北京会见了外长，并呼吁中国立即解决清关问题，该部周一在另一份声明中表示。

In late 2021, a new Chinese export requirement aimed at increasing domestic supplies triggered panic buying among South Korean drivers of diesel cars and trucks who are required to use urea solutions to cut emissions.翻译:2021年底，中国旨在增加国内供应的新出口要求引发了韩国柴油汽车和卡车司机的恐慌性购买，他们被要求使用尿素溶液来减少排放。

South Korea resorted to government rations while trying to secure alternative suppliers. It even scrambled a military tanker plane to Australia.翻译:韩国诉诸政府配给，同时试图寻找替代供应商。它甚至紧急升空一架军用加油机飞往澳大利亚。

Diesel cars account for about 40% of registered vehicles in South Korea.翻译:柴油车约占韩国登记车辆的40%。

Reporting by Hyonhee Shin; Additional reporting by Joyce Lee; Editing by Ed Davies and Christopher Cushing and Miral Fahmy翻译:申贤熙报道；乔伊斯·李的补充报道；编辑：埃德·戴维斯、克里斯托弗·库欣和米拉尔·法赫米

item.title: 中国军方：美国海军舰艇“非法”进入领海
item.description:
China's military on Monday said a U.S. Navy ship illegally entered waters adjacent to the Second Thomas Shoal, a disputed South China Sea atoll that has recently seen several maritime confrontations.翻译:中国军方周一表示，一艘美国海军舰艇非法进入仁爱礁附近海域。仁爱礁是一个有争议的南海环礁，最近发生了多起海上冲突。

"The U.S. seriously undermined regional peace and stability," a spokesperson for China's Southern Theater of Operations said in a statement, adding that the U.S. disrupted the South China Sea and violated China's sovereignty.翻译:中国南部战区发言人在一份声明中表示，美国严重破坏地区和平稳定，并补充说，美国扰乱南海，侵犯中国主权。

China is in disputes with several of its neighbours over its extensive claims of territorial waters in the South China Sea.翻译:中国与几个邻国就其在南海的广泛领海主张存在争议。

The U.S. Navy said the USS Gabrielle Giffords, an Independence-class littoral combat ship, was conducting routine operations in international waters in the South China Sea, consistent with international law.翻译:美国海军表示，独立级濒海战斗舰加布里埃尔·吉福兹号正在南海国际水域进行例行行动，符合国际法。

"Every day the U.S. 7th Fleet operates in the South China Sea, as they have for decades," the U.S. Navy said in a statement. "These operations demonstrate we are committed to upholding a free and open Indo-Pacific region."翻译:美国海军在一份声明中表示：“美国第七舰队每天都在南海活动，几十年来一直如此。” “这些行动表明我们致力于维护自由开放的印太地区。”

In recent months, China has had several runs-ins with Philippine vessels, and protested about U.S. ships patrolling disputed areas.翻译:近几个月来，中国与菲律宾船只发生了数次冲突，并对美国船只在争议地区巡逻表示抗议。

According to the Chinese military, the U.S. ship moved into waters adjacent to what China calls the Renai Reef, also known as Second Thomas Shoal, a part of the Spratly Islands. The Second Thomas Shoal lies in the Philippines' exclusive economic zone, according to an United Nations tribunal ruling in 2016.翻译:据中国军方称，美国船只进入了中国所说的仁爱礁（也称为仁爱礁，南沙群岛的一部分）附近海域。根据联合国法庭 2016 年的裁决，仁爱礁位于菲律宾的专属经济区。

The Chinese military spokesperson said the U.S. ship was monitored and followed, and that China's "troops in the theater are on high alert at all times to resolutely defend national sovereignty".翻译:中国军方发言人表示，美舰受到监视跟踪，中国“战区部队时刻保持高度戒备，坚决捍卫国家主权”。

"We will not be deterred from continuing to work alongside our allies and partners in support of our shared vision for a free and open Indo-pacific," the U.S. Navy responded.翻译:美国海军回应说：“我们不会被阻止继续与我们的盟友和伙伴合作，支持我们自由开放的印度太平洋地区的共同愿景。”

On Sunday, the Philippine Coast Guard deployed two of its vessels in the South China Sea after monitoring an "alarming" increase in the number of Chinese maritime militia vessels at a reef within the country's exclusive economic zone.翻译:周日，菲律宾海岸警卫队在南海部署了两艘船只，此前菲律宾海岸警卫队监测到该国专属经济区内的一个珊瑚礁上的中国海上民兵船只数量“令人震惊”地增加。

Reporting by Bernard Orr; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama, Diane Craft and Gerry Doyle翻译:伯纳德·奥尔报道；编辑：Chizu Nomiyama、Diane Craft 和 Gerry Doyle

item.title: 比亚迪称将保留对抹黑举报人的奖励制度
item.description:
China's electric vehicle giant BYD (002594.SZ) said on Sunday it would make permanent its system offering tipsters who report smear campaigns against the company up to 5 million yuan ($700,918).翻译:中国电动汽车巨头比亚迪(002594.SZ)周日表示，将永久性地向举报该公司抹黑活动的举报者提供最高 500 万元人民币（700,918 美元）的奖励。

The company in June 2022 increased the maximum amount providers of such information could receive from 1 million yuan to 5 million yuan, saying that policy was valid for a year. The minimum amount is 50,000 yuan.翻译:该公司于2022年6月将此类信息提供者可获得的最高金额从100万元提高到500万元，并称政策有效期为一年。最低金额为5万元。

"The evidence we collect includes but is not limited to chat records, emails, contracts, fund transfers and other information," the company said in a Weibo post. "Such information should be legally effective and BYD will give the provider a generous reward once it verifies it to be true."翻译:该公司在微博中表示，“我们收集的证据包括但不限于聊天记录、电子邮件、合同、资金转账等信息。” “此类信息应当具有法律效力，比亚迪一旦核实属实，将给予提供者丰厚的奖励。”

BYD did not say why it extended the reward programme, which it introduced in late 2021, saying it wanted to combat online smear campaigns and to protect the company's brand image. It did not immediately respond to a Reuters request for comment on Monday.翻译:比亚迪没有透露为何延长 2021 年底推出的奖励计划，称其希望打击网络诽谤活动并保护公司的品牌形象。该公司周一没有立即回应路透社的置评请求。

In September, the company hit back against online discussions that said BYD had leaked commercial secrets, saying those posts were pure rumours. It added that the police had apprehended the person responsible for spreading the rumour and that the company planned to take legal action.翻译:9月份，该公司对网上有关比亚迪泄露商业机密的讨论进行了反击，称这些帖子纯属谣言。该公司还表示，警方已逮捕散布谣言的责任人，该公司计划采取法律行动。

Warren Buffett-backed BYD is China's largest seller of electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles, and Tesla's (TSLA.O) closest rival in the global electric vehicle sales race.翻译:沃伦·巴菲特支持的比亚迪是中国最大的电动和插电式混合动力汽车销售商，也是特斯拉(TSLA.O)在全球电动汽车销售竞赛中最接近的竞争对手。

The company, which has been expanding overseas along with several other Chinese EV makers, broke records with new energy vehicle (NEV) sales rising 53% year-on-year to 824,001 in the third quarter, according to company data.翻译:该公司一直与其他几家中国电动汽车制造商一起向海外扩张，根据公司数据，第三季度新能源汽车 (NEV) 销量同比增长 53% 至 824,001 辆，打破了记录。

item.title: 沉默两年后，著名香港活动人士移居加拿大
item.description:
One of Hong Kong's most prominent pro-democracy activists, who was jailed as part of a China-imposed security crackdown, said on Sunday she had left Hong Kong for Canada after pressure from authorities left her with mental health issues.翻译:香港最著名的民主活动人士之一在中国实施的安全镇压中被监禁，她周日表示，在当局的压力下，她出现了心理健康问题，因此她已离开香港前往加拿大。

Agnes Chow, 27 - a core member of a now-disbanded group of younger activists, including Joshua Wong, who helped drive Hong Kong's pro-democracy movement - said on her Instagram account late on Sunday that she had left Hong Kong for studies in Canada.翻译:27 岁的周庭是一个现已解散的年轻活动人士团体的核心成员，其中包括帮助推动香港民主运动的黄之锋。周日晚些时候，她在 Instagram 帐户上表示，她已离开香港前往加拿大学习。

Their group, Demosisto, dissolved hours after Beijing passed a sweeping national security law in 2020.翻译:他们的团体众志 (Demosisto) 在北京于 2020 年通过一项全面的国家安全法数小时后解散。

The law has stifled the pro-democracy movement and led to more than 280 arrests, drawing criticism from some Western governments that the legislation is a tool of repression.翻译:该法律扼杀了民主运动，并导致 280 多人被捕，招致一些西方政府的批评，称该立法是镇压工具。

Beijing says the law has brought stability to Hong Kong after mass pro-democracy protests in 2019.翻译:北京表示，在 2019 年大规模民主抗议活动之后，该法律为香港带来了稳定。

Chow's posts - her first public comments since her release from prison in June 2021 - detailed how she had remained under "supervision" from the authorities.翻译:周的帖子是她自 2021 年 6 月出狱以来的首次公开评论，详细说明了她如何继续受到当局的“监督”。

Chow was sentenced to 10 months in jail in Nov 2020 over an unauthorised assembly charge. She was later released on bail on the condition she check in with police regularly, and her passport was confiscated as she faced an alleged national security charge, along with others including pro-democracy businessman Jimmy Lai.翻译:2020 年 11 月，周因未经授权集会罪被判处10 个月监禁。她后来被保释，条件是定期向警方报到，她的护照因面临所谓的国家安全指控而被没收，其他人包括亲民主商人黎智英。

Chow said it was as if the police wanted to remind her that she hadn't regained her freedom, and to "not try to do anything". She said the pressures led her to be diagnosed with depression and post-traumatic stress disorder.翻译:周说，警方似乎想提醒她，她还没有重获自由，并且“不要尝试做任何事情”。她说，压力导致她被诊断出患有抑郁症和创伤后应激障碍。

"Several emotional illnesses put my body and mind in a very unstable state," added Chow.翻译:“几种情绪疾病让我的身心处于非常不稳定的状态，”周补充道。

Reuters could not reach Chow, who arrived in Canada in September, for comment.翻译:路透社无法联系到九月份抵达加拿大的周请其置评。

Hong Kong police in a statement on Monday condemned Chow's "irresponsible behaviours that blatantly challenge law and order" and urged her not to be a fugitive for the rest of her life.翻译:香港警方周一在一份声明中谴责周女士“公然挑战法律和秩序的不负责任行为”，并敦促她余生不要成为逃犯。

Chow said it was only this year, after she was accepted by a university in Toronto, that the police agreed to return her passport if she travelled to the Chinese city of Shenzhen.翻译:周说，直到今年，在她被多伦多一所大学录取后，警方才同意在她前往中国深圳时归还她的护照。

The trip included visits to Chinese tech major Tencent and a "patriotic" exhibition on China's achievements.翻译:此行包括参观中国科技巨头腾讯以及展示中国成就的“爱国”展览。

"I was forced to go to mainland China in exchange for the opportunity to study abroad," she wrote.翻译:“我被迫去中国大陆，以换取出国留学的机会，”她写道。

Chow was due to report to Hong Kong's security police this month but decided not to return out of consideration for her personal safety and well being. "Maybe I won't return for the rest of my life," she wrote.翻译:周原定于本月向香港保安警察报到，但出于个人安全和健康考虑，决定不再返回。 “也许我这辈子都不会再回来了，”她写道。

item.title: 早盘竞价：鸽派美联储对市场走势的看法
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。

Asian markets are poised to start the week on the front foot, emboldened by Wall Street's late rally on Friday and plunge in U.S. rate expectations after Fed Chair Jerome Powell gave the clearest signal yet that the Fed is done raising interest rates and could soon move to cut them.翻译:受华尔街周五尾盘上涨的鼓舞，以及美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔发出迄今为止最明确的信号，表明美联储已经结束加息，并可能很快转向加息，亚洲市场准备以良好的势头开启本周。切掉它们。

The S&P 500's rise to its highest level this year, and continued loosening of financial conditions via the falling dollar and bond yields should pave the way for a positive open for Asian stocks and risk assets on Monday.翻译:标准普尔 500 指数升至今年最高水平，加上美元和债券收益率下跌导致金融状况持续宽松，应该为周一亚洲股市和风险资产的积极开盘铺平道路。

The dollar shed 3% in November, its biggest monthly fall in a year, and last week fell for a third week in a row. The two-year U.S. Treasury yield slumped 40 basis points last week - its steepest fall since March - and the implied rate on December 2024 'SOFR' futures on Friday fell below 4% for the first time.翻译:11 月份美元下跌 3%，创一年来最大单月跌幅，上周连续第三周下跌。美国两年期国债收益率上周暴跌 40 个基点，为 3 月份以来的最大跌幅，周五 2024 年 12 月“SOFR”期货隐含利率首次跌破 4%。

That packs a powerful punch. Many will argue that the U.S. bond and rates markets have gotten far too carried away, and that the Fed will not ease so quickly and aggressively next year.翻译:这具有强大的冲击力。许多人会认为，美国债券和利率市场已经太过失控，美联储明年不会如此迅速和激进地放松货币政策。

But Fed policymakers are now in their 'blackout period' ahead of the December 12-13 policy meeting. This means there will be no guidance from officials to take the wind out of investors' sails, certainly not on Monday, when the economic calendar is also very light.翻译:但美联储政策制定者目前正处于 12 月 12 日至 13 日政策会议之前的“停电期”。这意味着官员们不会出台任何指导措施来阻止投资者的前进，尤其是在周一，因为当时的经济日历也非常清淡。

There would appear to be room for Asian equities to bounce back - by some measures, the region's underperformance has rarely been this bad in years.翻译:亚洲股市似乎还有反弹的空间——从某​​些指标来看，该地区的表现不佳多年来很少如此糟糕。

The regional calendar highlights on Monday are New Zealand trade data and Australian inventories and corporate profit data, all for the third quarter.翻译:周一的区域日历重点是新西兰第三季度贸易数据以及澳大利亚库存和企业利润数据。

Economists polled by Reuters expect New Zealand's terms of trade to fall 1.9% on from the previous quarter, Australian inventories to fall 0.6%, and export volumes to slide 3.8%.翻译:路透社调查的经济学家预计，新西兰贸易条件将较上季度下降1.9%，澳大利亚库存将下降0.6%，出口量将下降3.8%。

The economic and policy calendar for the rest of the week has plenty more potential market-moving moments, including interest rate decisions from Australia and India, inflation figures from South Korea, the Philippines and Thailand, and GDP from Japan, Australia and South Korea.翻译:本周剩余时间的经济和政策日历还有更多潜在的市场影响时刻，包括澳大利亚和印度的利率决定，韩国、菲律宾和泰国的通胀数据，以及日本、澳大利亚和韩国的 GDP。

On the policy front, the Reserve Bank of Australia on Tuesday is expected to keep its cash rate on hold at a 12-year high of 4.35%, according to 28 of 30 analysts polled by Reuters. The other two are going for a 25 basis point hike.翻译:在政策方面，据路透社调查的 30 名分析师中的 28 名表示，预计澳大利亚储备银行周二将把现金利率维持在 12 年高点 4.35%。另外两个将加息 25 个基点。

New Zealand's central bank surprised markets last week with the hawkish rhetoric that accompanied its decision to leave rates on hold, and the RBA could echo a similar message.翻译:新西兰央行上周在决定维持利率不变的同时发表了强硬言论，令市场感到意外，而澳大利亚央行也可能会回应类似的信息。

In stark contrast to the Fed, rates futures markets are barely pricing in any rate cuts from the RBA next year at all. Indeed, the chance of a hike in the coming months is greater than the chance of a cut, current pricing shows.翻译:与美联储形成鲜明对比的是，利率期货市场几乎没有反映出澳大利亚央行明年的任何降息。事实上，目前的定价显示，未来几个月加息的可能性大于降息的可能性。

Here are key developments that could provide more direction to markets on Monday:翻译:以下是周一可能为市场提供更多方向的关键进展：

- New Zealand trade (Q3)翻译:- 新西兰贸易（第三季度）

- Australia inventories, corporate profits (Q3)翻译:- 澳大利亚库存、企业利润（第三季度）

- South Korea monetary base (November)翻译:- 韩国基础货币（11 月）

item.title: 台湾总统说，投票时想想香港发生了什么
item.description:
Taiwan President Tsai Ing-wen appealed to voters on Sunday to think of what had happened to Chinese-controlled Hong Kong when they cast their ballots next month, saying peace must be backed up with a commitment to boost defences.翻译:台湾总统蔡英文周日呼吁选民在下个月投票时想想中国控制的香港发生了什么，并表示和平必须以加强防御的承诺为后盾。

Taiwan prepares for presidential and parliamentary elections on Jan. 13 as China, which claims the democratically governed island as its own territory, ramps up military pressure to assert its claims, including two major war games around the island in the past year and a half.翻译:台湾正在为 1 月 13 日的总统和议会选举做准备，中国声称这个民主治理的岛屿是​​自己的领土，并加大军事压力以维护其主权，包括在过去一年半的时间里在台湾举行了两次大型战争演习。

China and Taiwan's main opposition party, the Kuomintang (KMT), have cast the election as a choice between war and peace. China detests Taiwan's ruling Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) and its presidential candidate, Vice President Lai Ching-te, calling them dangerous separatists.翻译:中国大陆和台湾主要反对党国民党都将这次选举视为战争与和平之间的选择。中国憎恨台湾执政的民进党及其总统候选人、副总统赖清德，称他们是危险的分裂分子。

Addressing supporters at a campaign rally for Lai in the capital Taipei, Tsai said the opposition was using "alarmist talk" of war and peace.翻译:蔡英文在首都台北举行的赖智竞选集会上向支持者发表讲话时表示，反对派正在利用战争与和平的“危言耸听的言论”。

"I want to ask you all here, does anyone want war? Nobody does," she said. "Look at Hong Kong and think of Taiwan. We don't want Hong Kong-style peace. We want dignified peace."翻译:“我想问你们所有人，有人想要战争吗？没有人想要，”她说。 “看看香港，想想台湾。我们不想要香港式的和平。我们想要有尊严的和平。”

Hong Kong, a former British colony, was returned to Chinese rule in 1997 with the promise of wide autonomy under a "one country, two systems" framework, which China has also offered to Taiwan - with little support on the island.翻译:香港是前英国殖民地，1997年回归中国统治，并承诺在“一国两制”框架下享有广泛自治权，中国也向台湾提供了这种自治权，但台湾方面几乎没有支持。

Beijing in 2020 imposed a tough national security law on Hong Kong, which it said was vital to restore stability after the city, a global financial hub, was rocked for months by sometimes violent anti-government and anti-China protests in 2019.翻译:北京于 2020 年对香港实施了严厉的国家安全法，称该法对于恢复香港的稳定至关重要，因为这座全球金融中心在 2019 年经历了数月的暴力反政府和反中抗议活动。

Tsai, barred by term limits from seeking re-election, has made bolstering Taiwan's defences a cornerstone of her tenure, a stance that Lai, leading in the polls, has pledged to continue.翻译:由于任期限制，蔡英文无法寻求连任，她已将加强台湾的防御作为其任期的基石，在民意调查中领先的赖清德承诺将继续保持这一立场。

They say only Taiwan's people can decide their future and have repeatedly offered talks with China but been rebuffed.翻译:他们说，只有台湾人民才能决定他们的未来，并多次提出与中国进行谈判，但遭到拒绝。

"To ensure peace we need to strengthen our ability to defend ourselves. Our house will have locks on it, but not to provoke our neighbours," Tsai told the rally. "Only with determination can we defend dignity, and only with strength can we ensure peace."翻译:“为了确保和平，我们需要加强自卫能力。我们的房子会上锁，但不会激怒我们的邻居，”蔡英文在集会上说。 “只有坚定，才能捍卫尊严，只有实力，才能确保和平。”

KMT presidential candidate Hou Yu-ih said on Saturday a vote for the DPP was equivalent to "sending everyone out to the battlefield" because supporting Taiwan independence would touch off a war.翻译:国民党总统候选人侯裕义周六表示，投票给民进党就等于“把所有人送上战场”，因为支持台独会引发战争。

The KMT traditionally favours close ties with China but strongly denies being pro-Beijing. It has pledged to reopen talks with China if it wins election.翻译:国民党传统上倾向于与中国建立密切关系，但强烈否认亲北京。它承诺如果赢得选举将与中国重启谈判。

Reporting by Ben Blanchard; Editing by William Mallard翻译:本·布兰查德报道；威廉·马拉德编辑

item.title: 菲律宾部署船只监视中国船只在南海的“非法”存在
item.description:
The Philippine Coast Guard (PCG) has deployed two of its vessels in the South China Sea after monitoring an "alarming" increase in the number of Chinese maritime militia vessels at a reef within the country's exclusive economic zone (EEZ).翻译:菲律宾海岸警卫队（PCG）监测到中国专属经济区（EEZ）内珊瑚礁上的中国海上民兵船只数量“令人震惊”地增加，随后在南海部署了两艘船只。

The number of Chinese boats believed to be manned by militia personnel has increased to more than 135 from 111 in November, scattered within the Whitsun Reef, which Manila calls the Julian Felipe Reef, the PCG said in a statement.翻译:PCG在一份声明中表示，据信由民兵人员驾驶的中国船只数量已从11月的111艘增加到超过135艘，这些船只分散在圣灵礁（马尼拉称之为朱利安费利佩礁）内。

"The PCG maintains its unwavering commitment to safeguarding maritime security, safety and the marine environment in the course of protecting the territorial integrity, sovereignty, sovereign rights, and jurisdiction of the Philippines in the West Philippine Sea," it said.翻译:声明称：“菲律宾海岸警卫队在保护菲律宾在西菲律宾海的领土完整、主权、主权权利和管辖权的过程中，坚定不移地致力于维护海上安全、安全和海洋环境。”

The West Philippine Sea is Manila's term for waters in the South China Sea that fall within its 200-nautical mile EEZ.翻译:西菲律宾海是马尼拉对南海 200 海里专属经济区水域的称呼。

There was no immediate comment from the Chinese Embassy in Manila.翻译:中国驻马尼拉大使馆没有立即发表评论。

An international tribunal invalidated China's claim to 90% of the South China Sea in 2016, but Beijing does not recognise the ruling. China has built islands in the disputed waters in recent years, laying air strips on some of them.翻译:2016年，国际法庭宣告中国对南海90%领土的主权主张无效，但北京不承认这一裁决。近年来，中国在争议海域修建岛屿，并在其中一些岛屿上铺设了飞机跑道。

Taiwan, Malaysia, Vietnam, and Brunei all claim parts of the sea.翻译:台湾、马来西亚、越南和文莱都对部分海域拥有主权。

The PCG's report comes several days after the Philippines carried out joint air and sea patrols with the United States, which was followed by a similar undertaking with Australia in the South China Sea, fanning tension with Beijing.翻译:菲律宾海岸警卫队的报告发布几天前，菲律宾与美国进行了联合空中和海上巡逻，随后又与澳大利亚在南中国海进行了类似的行动，加剧了与北京的紧张关系。

The Philippines is ramping up efforts to counter what it describes as China's "aggressive activities" in the South China Sea, which has also become a naval flashpoint for Chinese and U.S. tension.翻译:菲律宾正在加大力度反击其所称的中国在南海的“侵略活动”，南海也已成为中美紧张关系的海军热点。

China has accused the Philippines of enlisting "foreign forces" to patrol the South China Sea and stirring up trouble. Manila insists its maritime activities are within its rights.翻译:中国指责菲律宾招募“外国势力”在南海巡逻并煽动事端。马尼拉坚称其海上活动属于其权利范围。

Reporting by Karen Lema; Editing by Christopher Cushing翻译:凯伦·莱玛报道；克里斯托弗·库欣编辑

item.title: 前官员称中国有更大空间降准而非降息
item.description:
China is likely to implement proactive fiscal policy next year as there is still a need for the world's second-biggest economy to realise stable growth, a former central banker was cited as saying in state-owned media on Sunday.翻译:官方媒体周日援引一位前央行行长的话说，中国明年可能会实施积极的财政政策，因为世界第二大经济体仍然需要实现稳定增长。

The comment comes as the economy struggles for momentum after being hobbled by lengthy pandemic-busting measures, while market watchers fear severe debt woe among major property developers could spill over to other sectors.翻译:这一言论发表之际，经济在受到长期抗疫措施的阻碍后正在努力寻找动力，而市场观察人士担心主要房地产开发商的严重债务困境可能会蔓延到其他行业。

"It is expected that next year China will continue to implement positive fiscal policy, monetary policies that are in line with positive fiscal policy, with a relatively large policy space to lower the reserve requirement ratio," Sheng Songcheng, a former statistics and analysis director of the People's Bank of China, said in comments reported by Shanghai Securities News.翻译:“预计明年我国将继续实施积极的财政政策、与积极财政政策相一致的货币政策，降低存款准备金率有较大的政策空间。”原统计分析部主任盛松成说。中国人民银行行长在上海证券报报道的评论中表示。

With interest rates and loan prime rates at low levels, there is more space to cut banks' reserve requirement ratio (RRR) than to cut interest rates, Sheng said.翻译:盛表示，在利率和贷款优惠利率处于较低水平的情况下，降低银行存款准备金率（RRR）的空间比降息的空间更大。

The central bank lowered the RRR in September for the second time this year to boost liquidity and support economic recovery. Analysts expect another cut by year-end.翻译:9月份央行今年第二次下调存款准备金率，以增加流动性并支持经济复苏。分析师预计年底前将再次降息。

The weighted average RRR for financial institutions was around 7.4% after the cut.翻译:降准后金融机构加权平均存款准备金率在7.4%左右。

China is prudent in cutting interest rates as its monetary policy needs to consider internal and external balance, Sheng said.翻译:盛表示，中国的降息是审慎的，因为货币政策需要考虑内外平衡。

"It is expected that the interest rate differential between China and the U.S. will enter a period of stabilisation, so the renminbi (yuan) is likely to maintain a mild appreciation trend, but the appreciation is limited."翻译:“预计中美利差将进入稳定期，因此人民币可能会保持温和升值趋势，但升值幅度有限。”

Reporting by Mei Mei Chu; Editing by Christopher Cushing翻译:朱梅梅报道；克里斯托弗·库欣编辑

item.title: 白俄罗斯总统卢卡申科今年第二次访华
item.description:
Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko was heading to Beijing on Sunday for talks with Chinese leader Xi Jinping, Belarusian state media reported, the second trip of the close ally of Russian President Vladimir Putin to China this year.翻译:据白俄罗斯官方媒体报道，白俄罗斯总统亚历山大·卢卡申科将于周日前往北京与中国领导人习近平举行会谈，这是俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京的亲密盟友今年第二次访华。

Lukashenko, who according to Chinese state media was welcomed with a gun salute and military honours during his official Feb. 28 - March 2 visit, was this time heading for "a working visit," BelTA state news agency reported.翻译:据白通社报道，据中国官方媒体报道，卢卡申科在2月28日至3月2日的正式访问期间受到礼炮和军事荣誉的欢迎，这次他是进行“工作访问”。

"Negotiations between the head of the Belarusian state and president of the People's Republic of China Xi Jinping will take place in Beijing," BelTA said, citing Lukashenko's press service.翻译:白俄罗斯通讯社援引卢卡申科新闻部门的话说：“白俄罗斯国家元首和中华人民共和国主席习近平之间的谈判将在北京举行。”

"The agenda includes issues of trade, economic, investment and international cooperation."翻译:“议程包括贸易、经济、投资和国际合作问题。”

After their first talks this year, Xi said that the China-Belarus "friendship is unbreakable, and the two sides should constantly enhance political mutual trust and remain each other's true friends and good partners."翻译:今年首次会谈后，习近平表示，中白友谊牢不可破，双方要不断增强政治互信，做彼此的真朋友、好伙伴。

Lukashenko, the president of Belarus since 1994 who has been shunned by the West, backed Russia's invasion in Ukraine in February 2022 by allowing Moscow to use its territory to launch the war.翻译:自 1994 年起担任白俄罗斯总统的卢卡申科一直受到西方国家的回避，他支持俄罗斯于 2022 年 2 月入侵乌克兰，允许莫斯科利用乌克兰领土发动战争。

China maintains close ties to Russia and has never condemned its invasion of Ukraine, but Beijing became vocal earlier this year in calling for peace as the Ukraine conflict drags on.翻译:中国与俄罗斯保持着密切关系，从未谴责其入侵乌克兰，但随着乌克兰冲突的持续，北京今年早些时候开始直言不讳地呼吁和平。

After their March 1 meeting, both Lukashenko and Xi called for the "soonest possible" peace deal for Ukraine. But the war, now in its 22nd month, has no end in sight, with neither side willing to compromise to negotiate.翻译:3月1日会面后，卢卡申科和习近平都呼吁“尽快”达成乌克兰和平协议。但战争已经进入第22个月，还看不到结束的迹象，双方都不愿意在谈判中妥协。

(This story has been refiled to correct the date to Feb. 28 in paragraph 2)翻译:（这篇报道已重新归档，将第 2 段中的日期更正为 2 月 28 日）

item.title: 中国监管机构将加快小型金融机构改革
item.description:
A key Chinese financial regulator said on Sunday it would accelerate reform of small and midsize financial institutions as it steps up its oversight of the sector.翻译:中国一位主要金融监管机构周日表示，将加快中小型金融机构改革，加强对该行业的监管。

The National Financial Regulatory Administration (NFRA) will collaborate with the General Administration of Financial Supervision to tighten supervision of the financial industry other than the securities market, director Li Yunze said in an interview with state media Xinhua.翻译:国家金融监管局局长李云泽在接受官方媒体新华社采访时表示，国家金融监管局将与金融监管总局合作，加强对证券市场以外的金融业的监管。

NFRA, the watchdog overseeing all aspects of China’s $57 trillion financial sector, along with other departments will focus on dealing with “key people” and “key behaviours” that are causing major financial risks and undermining market order, including illegal third-party intermediaries, he said.翻译:NFRA作为监管中国57万亿美元金融业各个方面的监管机构，将与其他部门一起重点打击造成重大金融风险和破坏市场秩序的“关键人物”和“关键行为”，包括非法第三方中介机构、他说。

Li said the NFRA will also take advantage of current favourable opportunities to increase the promotion of risk disposal.翻译:李克强表示，国家监管局也将利用当前有利时机，加大风险处置的推进力度。

It will promote small and midsize banking institutions to optimise their structure, improve quality and increase efficiency, Li said.翻译:李克强表示，这将推动中小银行机构优化结构、提质增效。

He added that they will encourage insurance companies to return to their original function of protection, and guide asset management, non-banking and other institutions to adhere to their positioning.翻译:他表示，鼓励保险公司回归原有保障功能，引导资管、非银行等机构坚守定位。

“At present, the operation of China's financial sector is generally stable and the overall risk resistance is strong,” he said.翻译:“当前，我国金融业运行总体平稳，整体抗风险能力较强。”他表示。

"We are fully confident and have the conditions and ability to increase vitality through reform, solve problems through development and properly respond to the challenges of various types of financial risks by increasing the volume of inventory."翻译:我们完全有信心、有条件、有能力通过改革增强活力，通过发展解决问题，通过增去库存妥善应对各类金融风险挑战。

Reporting by Mei Mei Chu; Editing by Christopher Cushing翻译:朱梅梅报道；克里斯托弗·库欣编辑 and William Mallard

item.title: 官员称，由于已知病原体，中国呼吸道疾病发病率上升
item.description:
China's surge in respiratory illness is caused by known pathogens and there is no sign of new infectious diseases, a health official said on Saturday as the country faces its first full winter since lifting strict COVID-19 restrictions.翻译:周六，一名卫生官员表示，中国呼吸道疾病激增是由已知病原体引起的，目前没有出现新传染病的迹象，该国正面临解除严格的 COVID-19 限制以来的第一个完整冬季。

The spike in illness in the country where COVID emerged in late 2019 attracted the spotlight when the World Health Organization sought information last week, citing a report on clusters of undiagnosed pneumonia in children.翻译:世界卫生组织上周援引一份关于儿童群体性未确诊肺炎的报告寻求信息时，2019年底出现新冠肺炎的国家的疾病激增引起了人们的关注。

Chinese authorities will open more paediatric outpatient clinics, seek to ensure more elderly people and children receive flu vaccines and encourage people to wear masks and wash their hands, Mi Feng, an official with China's National Health Commission, told a press conference.翻译:中国国家卫生健康委员会官员米锋在新闻发布会上表示，中国当局将开设更多儿科门诊，努力确保更多老年人和儿童接种流感疫苗，并鼓励人们戴口罩和勤洗手。

Doctors in China and experts abroad have not expressed alarm about China's outbreaks, given that many other countries saw similar increases in respiratory diseases after easing pandemic measures, which China did at the end of last year.翻译:中国的医生和国外的专家并没有对中国的疫情爆发表示担忧，因为许多其他国家在中国去年年底放松了疫情措施后，呼吸道疾病也出现了类似的增加。

Reporting by David Kirton; Editing by Lincoln Feast and William Mallard翻译:大卫·科顿报道；林肯·费斯特和威廉·马拉德编辑

item.title: 恒大债权人集团支持维持经营而非破产-南华早报
item.description:
A key offshore creditor group of China Evergrande Group (3333.HK) supports keeping the developer operating, the South China Morning Post (SCMP) reported ahead of a court hearing on Monday that could decide to liquidate the indebted firm.翻译:据《南华早报》报道，周一法庭听证会可能决定清算这家负债累累的公司，中国恒大集团（3333.HK）的一个主要海外债权人集团支持维持该开发商的运营。

The group, which owns about $2 billion in offshore notes guaranteed by Evergrande, issued a statement late on Friday urging that Hengda Real Estate, Evergrande’s flagship onshore unit, be allowed to maintain operations to ensure completion of homes and delivery of homes, the newspaper said.翻译:该集团拥有约20亿美元由恒大担保的离岸票据，该集团周五晚间发表声明，敦促恒大在岸旗舰子公司恒大地产继续运营，以确保房屋竣工和交付。 。

"No stakeholders of Hengda, be it customers, suppliers, creditors, or the (Chinese) government, would benefit from forcing Hengda into a multi-year, value-destructive bankruptcy process," it cited the statement as saying.翻译:声明援引声明称：“恒大的任何利益相关者，无论是客户、供应商、债权人还是（中国）政府，都不会因迫使恒大进入多年的、破坏价值的破产程序而受益。”

"Such a bankruptcy process would only detract from the common goals of ensuring the prompt completion of projects and the timely delivery of homes, as well as procuring the long-term sustainability of Hengda as a going concern."翻译:“这样的破产程序只会损害确保项目迅速完成、房屋及时交付以及确保恒大持续经营的长期可持续性的共同目标。”

Evergrande, the world's most indebted property developer, and the advisers to the creditor group did not immediately respond to requests for comment.翻译:全球负债最重的房地产开发商恒大集团和债权人集团的顾问没有立即回应置评请求。

The SCMP quoted the advisers, the Kirkland & Ellis law firm and investment bank Moelis, as saying the creditors would "continue working together with Hengda and its management to support their efforts", adding there was "no benefit or upside" in any bankruptcy of Hengda to the noteholders.翻译:《南华早报》援引顾问公司凯易律师事务所和投资银行 Moelis 的话说，债权人将“继续与恒大及其管理层合作，支持他们的努力”，并补充说，恒大的任何破产“没有任何好处或好处”。恒大向票据持有人表示。

Evergrande has until the Hong Kong court hearing on Monday to present a "concrete" revised debt restructuring proposal for offshore creditors, a judge said last month after its original plan had lapsed.翻译:上个月，在恒大原计划失效后，一名法官表示，恒大必须在周一香港法庭听证会之前向海外债权人提交一份“具体”的修订后的债务重组方案。

Reuters reported on Thursday that Evergrande this week sought to avert liquidation with a restructuring proposal, offering to swap some offshore debt into equity in the company and two Hong Kong-listed units, and repay the rest with non-tradeable "certificates" backed by offshore assets.翻译:路透社周四报道称，恒大本周寻求通过一项重组方案来避免清算，提出将部分离岸债务转换为该公司和两家香港上市子公司的股权，并以离岸支持的不可交易“证书”偿还其余部分。资产。

The creditors group responded by demanding a controlling equity stake in Evergrande and the two Hong Kong subsidiaries, a source familiar with the matter said on Friday.翻译:一位知情人士周五表示，债权人团体的回应是要求获得恒大及其两家香港子公司的控股权。

Reporting by Clare Jim; Editing by William Mallard翻译:克莱尔·吉姆报道；威廉·马拉德编辑

item.title: 五名参议员要求拜登在出现呼吸道疾病病例后实施中国旅行禁令
item.description:
Five Republican senators led by Marco Rubio on Friday asked President Joe Biden's administration to ban travel between the United States and China after a spike in Chinese respiratory illness cases.翻译:在中国呼吸道疾病病例激增后，以马可·卢比奥为首的五名共和党参议员周五要求总统乔·拜登政府禁止美国和中国之间的旅行。

"We should immediately restrict travel between the United States and (China) until we know more about the dangers posed by this new illness," said the letter signed by Rubio, the top Republican on the Senate Intelligence Committee, along with Senators J.D. Vance, Rick Scott, Tommy Tuberville and Mike Braun.翻译:参议院情报委员会共和党领袖卢比奥与参议员万斯共同签署的信中表示： “我们应该立即限制美国和（中国）之间的旅行，直到我们更多地了解这种新疾病带来的危险。”里克·斯科特、汤米·图伯维尔和迈克·布劳恩。

The rise in cases became a global issue last week when the World Health Organization asked China for more information, citing a report on clusters of undiagnosed pneumonia in children by the Program for Monitoring Emerging Diseases.翻译:上周，世界卫生组织援引新发疾病监测计划关于儿童未确诊肺炎集群的报告，要求中国提供更多信息，病例上升成为一个全球性问题。

A Biden administration official said the United States was closely monitoring the uptick in respiratory illnesses in China, but added, "We are seeing seasonal trends. Nothing is appearing out of the ordinary. ... At this time, there is no indication that there is a link between the people who are seeking care in U.S. emergency departments and the outbreak of respiratory illness in China."翻译:拜登政府的一名官员表示，美国正在密切监测中国呼吸道疾病的上升情况，但他补充说：“我们看到了季节性趋势。没有任何异常情况......目前没有迹象表明存在这种情况。”这是在美国急诊室寻求治疗的人们与中国呼吸道疾病爆发之间的联系。”

The spokesperson for the Chinese Embassy in Washington, Liu Pengyu, said in response to the Rubio letter, "The relevant claims are purely ill-intentioned fabrications. China firmly opposes them."翻译:中国驻华盛顿大使馆发言人刘鹏宇回应卢比奥信函表示，有关说法纯属恶意捏造，中方坚决反对。

Maria Van Kerkhove, acting director of the WHO's department of epidemic and pandemic preparedness and prevention, said earlier this week the increase appeared to be driven by a rise in the number of children contracting pathogens that they had avoided during two years of COVID-19 restrictions.翻译:世界卫生组织流行病和大流行防范部门代理主任玛丽亚·范·科霍夫(Maria Van Kerkhove)本周早些时候表示，这一增长似乎是由于感染病原体的儿童数量增加所致，而他们在两年的COVID-19限制期间避免了感染病原体。 。

In recent months, the United States and China have been steadily increasing flights between the countries, though they remain far below 2019 levels. The number approved rose on Nov. 9 to 35 per week for each country, up from 12 per week in August.翻译:近几个月来，美国和中国一直在稳步增加两国之间的航班，但仍远低于 2019 年的水平。 11 月 9 日，每个国家/地区的批准数量从 8 月份的每周 12 个增加到每周 35 个。

In January 2020, then-President Donald Trump barred most non-U.S. citizens who had recently been in China from entering the United States over COVID concerns, but did not restrict flights between the two countries.翻译:2020年1月，时任总统唐纳德·特朗普出于对新冠病毒的担忧，禁止大多数最近到过中国的非美国公民进入美国，但没有限制两国之间的航班。

The United States lifted the unprecedented travel restrictions for fully vaccinated international visitors starting in November 2021, including from China. The U.S. rescinded a separate requirement that air travelers test negative before arriving in June 2022.翻译:从 2021 年 11 月开始，美国取消了对已接种疫苗的国际游客前所未有的旅行限制，其中包括来自中国的游客。美国取消了一项要求航空旅客在 2022 年 6 月抵达之前检测结果呈阴性的单独要求。

The United States in January had started requiring air passengers to get negative COVID tests after Beijing's decision to lift its stringent zero-COVID policies, but lifted the requirements in March.翻译:在北京决定取消严格的零新冠病毒政策后，美国于一月份开始要求航空乘客进行新冠病毒检测呈阴性，但在三月份取消了这一要求。
